about_the_game:
Embark on an Epic Fantasy Adventure in this Thrilling Action RPG!


Rise, adventurer, harness the power of unique ability combos, and conquer the treacherous depths of the Lands Between. Forge alliances, challenge fearsome foes, and ascend to become a legend in this vast, interconnected world.


  • Get XP (Monsters, Quests, PvP)
  • Level up
  • Select 1 of 3 random abilities (Max: 6 active + 6 passive)




  • Search for loot (monsters, chests, quests, pvp)
  • Equip and get stronger




  • Find a portal
  • Escape the dungeon with loot

A Boundless Realm Of Discovery

Venture through a diverse and expansive world, where sprawling open fields and intricate dungeons seamlessly intertwine. Experience the exhilaration of uncovering untold mysteries and overcoming overwhelming threats, fueling a profound sense of accomplishment.

Craft Your Own Legendary Hero

Customize your character's appearance and skillfully mix and match weapons, armor, and magic to suit your playstyle. Develop your hero according to your vision, be it as a mighty warrior or a master of sorcery.

An Enthralling Narrative Woven From Myth

Delve into a multilayered story told in fragments, as the intersecting thoughts and motivations of various characters unfold in the Lands Between, crafting an epic drama born from ancient myths.

Innovative Online Connectivity

Engage in intense multiplayer experiences, joining forces with other players as you traverse the world together, and immerse yourself in a unique asynchronous online environment that creates a palpable presence of fellow adventurers.

In this game, you will embark on an epic adventure through endlessly diverse and randomly generated dungeons.







Dive into a dark medieval fantasy world where dungeon crawling, extraction RPG elements, and fierce PvP battles blend seamlessly. Unite with friends, overcome monstrous foes, and outwit rival treasure seekers in pursuit of mythical riches. This groundbreaking third-person dungeon PvPvE adventure awaits you in the Lands Between – will you rise to the challenge and claim your destiny?

name: Adventurer's Gambit: Dungeons of Fortune Demo
short_description: Dynamically generated dungeons (over 1bln variations). Combine unique ability combos. Contest with other 60 adventurers (solo, trio) in this extraction RPG game.
